title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 372.9 - Funding assets
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 372.9 - Funding assets

State Regulations

The benefit liabilities of the plan shall be funded on a plan
year to plan year basis. The fund established under this section shall not be
accumulated to pay benefits payable in future years. Any assets of the fund not
used for paying benefits for a current plan year shall be used, as determined
by the trustee, for the payment of the administrative expenses of the plan for
the plan year or for future plan years or paid to the system as an additional
employer contribution. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
372.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
